tools.name: echo
tools.description: A tool that returns the input message as-is. Also provides message length and case conversion.

tools.name: ping
tools.description: A tool that performs a connectivity check for the Lambda function and retrieves system information. Returns details such as response time and memory usage.

tools.name: kb-retrieve
tools.description: A tool that retrieves relevant chunks from an Amazon Bedrock Knowledge Base using semantic search. Returns the most relevant document chunks for the specified query.

knowledgeBaseId.description: The ID of the Knowledge Base to search

numberOfResults.description: Maximum number of results to retrieve (default: 5)
